mapper.select: SELECT admin.id AS id, admin.username AS userName, admin.phone AS phone, admin.nick_name AS nickName, groups.name AS groupName, admin.status AS status, admin.last_time AS lastTime FROM admin LEFT JOIN admin_group ON admin.id = admin_group.admin_id left JOIN groups ON admin_group.group_id = groups.id ORDER BY admin.create_time DESC

SELECT admin.id AS id, admin.username AS userName, admin.phone AS phone, admin.nick_name AS nickName, groups.name AS groupName, admin.status AS status, admin.last_time AS lastTime FROM admin LEFT JOIN admin_group ON admin.id = admin_group.admin_id left JOIN groups ON admin_group.group_id = groups.id WHERE admin.id = #{id}

SELECT groups.id AS id, groups.name AS name, groups.create_time AS createTime, groups.`comment` AS comment, admin.nick_name AS nickName, admin.username AS userName FROM groups LEFT JOIN admin ON groups.create_admin_id = admin.id WHERE groups.id = #{id}

SELECT admin.id AS adminId, admin_group.id AS adminGroupId, admin.nick_name AS nickName, admin.username AS userName, admin.`status` AS status, admin.update_time AS updateTime FROM admin LEFT JOIN admin_group ON admin.id = admin_group.admin_id LEFT JOIN groups ON groups.id = admin_group.group_id WHERE groups.id = #{id}
